quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of "shrinking the vegetables while maintaining their structural coherence and visual plausibility," assess if the size reduction introduces unnatural textures or loss of detail in the broccoli and cauliflower.
quality_check_questions.question: Do the shrunk vegetables retain their natural texture and fine details without visible artifacts?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Considering the sub requirement of "avoiding distortion such as unnatural textures and ensuring the proportion and physical rationality of each element," evaluate if the shrinkage results in distorted shapes or unnatural proportions.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the shapes of the shrunk vegetables proportionate and physically plausible, avoiding any unnatural distortion?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Given the sub requirement of "maintaining the overall realism and natural appearance," examine if the shrinkage affects the natural appearance of the vegetables in terms of color and material.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the shrinkage preserve the natural colors and material appearance of the vegetables without introducing any artificial tones?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Focusing on the sub requirement of "ensuring structural consistency and visual credibility," verify if the spatial arrangement of the shrunk vegetables remains coherent within the dish.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the spatial arrangement of the shrunk vegetables consistent with the original structure, maintaining visual credibility within the dish?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: According to the sub requirement of "avoiding the introduction of obvious artifacts and maintaining a natural appearance," check if the shrinkage process has caused any broken geometric shapes or unnatural edges.
quality_check_questions.question: Have the edges and geometric shapes of the shrunk vegetables remained intact, avoiding any broken or unnatural edges?
